lines.text:
3]
The lips of a strange woman drip honey, and her mouth is smoother than oil... But her end is bitter as wormwood, sharp as a two-edged sword!
I wanted so much things, i wanted the whole world, but... it was really only you !

[aloudin church]
If the men of Bagkor won't give to the church, the women will.

[contemptuously to Ephraim]
You can't come into this house, you wretched coward! You killed your father!
But... the rain. You know what happens to the roads in the rain.
Yes, they get very muddy, but they don't change the direction.
Your mother must be a wonderful woman. I hope that someday you'll say that I'm just like her.
That won't be easy. Nother had nine boys.
Honey, listen, with your looks you don't have to worry. You can get the youngest and best-looking man on the pier.
I don't want the youngest. I want the richest.
Why does everything frighten you? You're going to make me very angry. and if I get angry and go on wanting you, I might tell him what happened between us.

[referring to his father]
No, but which of us will he believe?
